teal.ui.swing

  • Packages that use teal.ui.swing 
    Package Description
    teal.app
    This package rovides base classes and interfaces for the generic application SimPlayerApp and stand-alone applications.
    teal.sim.control
    Provides GUI Controls that deal with Simulation objects.
    teal.ui.control
    Provides simulation specific graphic user interface components.

    tealsim.physics.examples

  • Classes in teal.ui.swing used by teal.app 
    Class and Description
    JTaskPane
    JTaskPane provides an elegant view to display a list of tasks ordered by groups.
  • Classes in teal.ui.swing used by teal.sim.control 
    Class and Description
    JCollapsiblePane.JCollapsiblePaneContainer
    Tagging interface for containers in a JCollapsiblePane hierarchy who needs to be revalidated (invalidate/validate/repaint) when the pane is expanding or collapsing.
    JTaskPaneGroup
    JTaskPaneGroup is a container for tasks and other arbitrary components.

    Collapses or expands its content area with animation and fade in/fade out effects.
